ai-patthana15.42:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.42:0.3_0: Next there are bites, mind, and it.
ai-patthana15.42:1.1_0: Being mixed up with the mind, not misapprehending the teaching.
ai-patthana15.42:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
ai-patthana15.42:2.1_0: Being mixed up with the mind, not unskillful phenomena don’t arise dependent on the unskillful.
ai-patthana15.42:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
ai-patthana15.42:2.1_3: (This should be expanded as for the three roots of the following.)
